content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Smith. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the monthly rental price. How much does it cost to rent this apartment for one month?

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible, so I am confident that I will pay my rent on time every month. I understand if there are any additional costs for utilities or other expenses, but I would like to know the monthly rental price only. Thank you.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Smith. The monthly rental price for this apartment is 1,200 Euros. This includes the cost of rent, heating, and electricity. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else I can help you with.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,200 Euros per month.

Thank you for the opportunity to rent this apartment. I will pay my rent on time every month and I will take good care of the property. I will move in on the 1st of July and I will sign the lease agreement on the 15th of June.

Please let me know if there is anything else I need to do or if there is any additional information I need to provide.

Thank you again for your help.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you, Mr. Smith, for choosing my apartment. I am glad to hear that you will sign the lease agreement on the 15th of June and move in on the 1st of July. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with or if you need any additional information. I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
